Name: Cisco UCS Storage Message Registry
Description: This registry defines the Storage messages for Cisco UCS servers implementations.

StorageSubsystemNotReady.Description: Indicates that  storage subsystem is not ready yet and cannot accept any commands.
StorageSubsystemNotReady.Resolution: Please wait for storage subsystem to become ready, or check if host is powered ON.

StorageVolumeCreateFailed.Resolution: Please cross verify the arguments and re-submit the action.

StorageVolumeCreateSuccess.Description: Indicates that Volume creation is successful.

StorageSPDMAuthenticationFailure.Description: Indicates SPDM authentication failure for adapter, adapter must be replaced.
StorageSPDMAuthenticationFailure.Message: SPDM Authentication Failure: Unauthorized card detected.

StorageBBUDegraded.Description: Indicates adapter battery backup unit needs to be reseated or replaced.
StorageBBUDegraded.Message: Adapter Battery Backup Unit Degraded: Please reseat or replace.
StorageBBUDegraded.Resolution: Please reseat or replace the battery backup unit on the storage controller.

StorageBBUInoperable.Description: Indicates adapter battery backup unit must be replaced.
StorageBBUInoperable.Message: Adapter Battery Backup Unit Failure: Please replace.
StorageBBUInoperable.Resolution: Please replace the battery backup unit on the storage controller.

StorageDriveNonOptimalState.Description: Storage drive operating in non-optimal state. Drive is not functioning correctly or unresponsive.
StorageDriveNonOptimalState.Message: Storage drive operating in non-optimal state. Drive is not functioning correctly or unresponsive.
StorageDriveNonOptimalState.Resolution: Please reseat or replace the drive. Contact CISCO technical support for more assistance.

StorageResetToFactoryDefaults.Description: Storage Controller settings were reset to factory defaults. Host power cycle required for changes to take affect
StorageResetToFactoryDefaults.Message: Storage Controller reset to factory defaults.
StorageResetToFactoryDefaults.Resolution: Host power cycle required for changes to take affect.
